page.title: 19PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {VOTE, VOTE, VOTE When we play vote, vote, vote we all get in a circle and go around and around singing, VOTE, VOTE, VOTE, for.......,here comes........ at the door........is the one to have a bit of fun so we don't want......... any more. CHUCK HIM or HER OUT. Then we start again and choose a new person and so on. {TORTURES Tortures is a rather vicous game.Girls chase boys,when you catch them they have a choice of tortures: {KNEE}you knee them in the bottom. {LAP}you sit on their lap {BIN}you sit them in the bin. {SQUASH}you squash them against fence. {STRETCH}you grab by each arm & stretch {STAND}put feet on to get them dirty {AND ANY OTHER NASTY THINGS GIRLS LIKE {ME LIKE DOING TO BOYS!!!!}
